text: Ðis synd þa landgemæru æt mearnan clyfe X hida.
<../images/tbar.gif>is þonne ærest of turf hlawan in þone holen weg.
Of þam holan wege innon afene<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeþ wiþ ufan wearroces yge.
And se mæd hom þær to.
Of þam hlawe on þa mær dic.
Of þære dic on bradan wege.
Ondlang þæs sices innon þone þyrs pyt.
Of pidwællan æfter þam wege to þam uferan heafdan.
Þæt æfter heafdan æft in turf hlawen.
